mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM statistic.requestinfo) / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT LEFT(createDate, 6)) FROM statistic.requestinfo) AS avgDailyLogin

SELECT u.hr_organ, LEFT(ri.createDate, 4) AS yearMonth, COUNT(*) AS loginCount FROM statistic.requestinfo ri JOIN user u ON ri.userId = u.userId WHERE LEFT(ri.createDate, 4) = #{yearMonth} AND u.hr_organ = #{dept} GROUP BY u.hr_organ, LEFT(ri.createDate, 4)
